esef-24084_2021.value: Nizhnyayа Krasnoselskaya st. 39, bld. 1, Moscow, Russia

esef-24085_2021.value: The principal activities of the Group, which are unchanged from last year, are the provision of railway transportation  services, using own and leased rolling stock and fleet engaged from third party rail operators, as well as the operating  lease of rolling stock.
